plugin.name: cube
plugin._long: A plugin to show the current workspace row as a cube.

option.name: activate
option._long: Activates the cube with the specified button.

option.name: rotate_left
option._long: Rotates left with the specified activator.

option.name: rotate_right
option._long: Rotates right with the specified activator.

option.name: deform
option._long: Specifies the deformation to be used.

option.name: zoom
option._long: Sets the level of zoom out. Setting the value to **0.0** means to not zoom out.

option.name: initial_animation
option._long: Sets the initial animation duration in milliseconds.

option.name: speed_zoom
option._long: Sets the speed factor for zooming.

option.name: speed_spin_horiz
option._long: Sets the velocity of horizontal spinning.

option.name: speed_spin_vert
option._long: Sets the velocity of vertical spinning.

option.name: background
option._long: Sets the background color for the simple background mode.

option.name: skydome_texture
option._long: Loads the specified texture for the skydome background mode.

option.name: cubemap_image
option._long: Loads the specified image for the cubemap background mode.
